thread.title: With Videos, Islamic State Enters Latest Palestinian-Israeli Fighting
thread.title_full: With Videos, Islamic State Enters Latest Palestinian-Israeli Fighting - WSJ

author: Rory Jones
title: With Videos, Islamic State Enters Latest Palestinian-Israeli Fighting
text:
JERUSALEMâ€”Islamic State released a video Friday of a Hebrew-speaking militant threatening more attacks on Jews, underscoring the influence of social-media networks in the latest bloodshed and the difficult task ahead for Israeli and Palestinian leaders trying to end weeks of violence.
The video, posted on YouTube and verified by the SITE Intelligence Group, which monitors extremist groups, shows a masked man with a rifle warning that...
